data.name: Tanks, But No Tanks
data.detailed_description:
Tanks, But No Tanks is an updated take on a classic top-down tank shooter. This stylized concoction of violence and soft aesthetics is easy to pick up, but hard to master. You'll find yourself evading increasingly difficult foes while ricocheting bullets around unique level layouts.



Use your mouse or a controller to aim your bullets and shoot your way through each level. The only way to move on is by clearing out all enemies before meeting your own demise.



Be careful though. One wrong move and you're back to level 1. Get through dozens of levels and claim your right as the Tank King.



Use a diverse weapon set, ranging from a triple-shot to freezing bullets to take on equally as diverse enemy types. Clear each level as efficiently as you can.

data.short_description: A stylized top-down shooter, where you'll find yourself evading increasingly difficult foes while ricocheting bullets around unique level layouts. Use a diverse array of weapon types, ranging from a triple-shot to freezing bullets to take on equally as diverse enemy types.
data.reviews:
“I think this game is going to be pretty good.”
Me

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10.5 or above
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
